description: Adlung lists this name along with Pammert, Pombarda, Pombart and Pommer (all of which he considers synonyms for Bombarde), and says only �see variously under Hautbois and Bombarda�. However, in his entry for Schallmey he also says �others use the names Musette and Pomart instead of saying Schallmey; see Samber, p. 155�. No other source mentions this name.
